description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; man in white in lower right corner with his head turned toward the viewer sits behind a counter running diagonally across lower third of image; standing facing him on the left side of the image is a man dressed in black holding a tall black hat
portfolio: From Plate 7 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Seventh Scene, Plate 7 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
